author: rjung
msg: Fix lookup of apu-config for VPATH builds
For included APU, apu-config is not in the srcdir but instead
in the builddir. That only matters for VPATH builds, ie. when
you build outside of the source tree.

author: luc
msg: Added a setQRRankingThreshold method to Levenberg-Marquardt optimizer to improve robustness of rank determination.
